ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that the alcohol use history of an individual is unavailable.

PermissibleValues.value: Consumed alcohol in the past, but currently a non-drinker
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Current non-drinker with Past Alcohol Consumption

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Current non-drinker with Past Alcohol Consumption
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual has consumed alcohol in the past, but is currently a non-drinker.

Concepts.longName: Current non-drinker with Past Alcohol Consumption
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual has consumed alcohol in the past, but is currently a non-drinker.

PermissibleValues.value: Alcohol consumption more than 2 drinks per day for men and more than 1 drink per day for women

Concepts.definition: Alcohol consumption more than two drinks per day for men and more than one drink per day for women.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who does not drink at the present time and who claims that they have never been a drinker.

Concepts.definition: An individual who does not drink at the present time and who claims that they have never been a drinker.

PermissibleValues.value: Alcohol consumption equal to or less than 2 drinks per day for men and 1 drink or less per day for women
